whatispptextblock: PersonaPlus is the the app that GIVES YOU A PLUS, or in other words: it helps you take care of your health, with routines, guides, goals, reminders, and everything you need to craft your best self.
howtouseblock: Easy. Create an objective. You'll receive reminders, tips, and even a complete assistant to do live sessions with detailed indications when it's an activity. Write down your progress and get statics and better tips.
differentblock: PersonaPlus is a FREE app. Free from ads, 'premium' plans, payments, ads, tracking... And it's Free Open Source Software.
mockups: Disclaimer: These images are designs / mockups of how the final version could look. Current downloadable version is a testing demo: it could look different from the images shown here.
downloadnow: The first preview version is out. Download now!
downloaddisclaimer: PersonaPlus is an independant app with only one developer (myself, Zaka). It's not finished, so don't be surprised if the app lacks features, doesn't look as featured on this website, or has errors.
solodev: PersonaPlus is a Work in progress, I am still developing it. You can see my progress, contribute to the repo, or get in the Discord server to hang out in the meantime.
opensource: This website is opensource in GitHub, in the repository
wevelauncherfirstdemo: Finally! We've released our first downloadable testing version. Take a look at it
